label: Animal_Insect_P_PictureBook
text: This beetle's hard body resembles armor. When the shell is cooked with monster parts, the resulting elixir boosts your defense.

label: Animal_Insect_R_Desc
text: This rare butterfly only shows itself when it rains. The organs in its body produce an insulating compound. When made into an elixir, it offers electrical resistance.

label: Animal_Insect_S_Name
text: Hightail Lizard

label: Animal_Insect_Q_PictureBook
text: A butterfly found in the woods and plains of warm regions. Its wings absorb the warmth of the sun. Cook it with monster parts to create an elixir that makes you feel warm and fuzzy.

label: Animal_Insect_C_Desc
text: This dragonfly prefers the cool shade of trees to the warmth of the sun. Its wings disperse heat from its body, which can be cooked into a heat-resistance elixir.

label: Animal_Insect_N_PictureBook
text: The powdery scales of this butterfly's wings cool the air around it. Watching it flutter around snowflakes is a thing of beauty. Cook it with monster parts for a heat-resistant elixir.

label: Animal_Insect_C_Name
text: Cold Darner

label: Animal_Insect_N_Desc
text: The powdery scales of this butterfly's wings cool the air around it. Watching it flutter around snowflakes is a thing of beauty. Cook it with monster parts for a heat-resistant elixir.

label: Animal_Insect_F_Desc
text: This fairy will fly from your pouch and heal all your wounds the moment you lose your last heart. It's easily mistaken for a firefly at first, but it glows in the daylight as well as night.

label: Animal_Insect_G_Name
text: Bladed Rhino Beetle

label: Animal_Insect_N_Name
text: Winterwing Butterfly

label: Animal_Insect_AB_Name
text: Smotherwing Butterfly

label: Animal_Insect_AA_Desc
text: This valuable beetle can live up to ten years. When cooked with monster parts, its impressive vitality translates into an elixir that will greatly restore your stamina.

label: Animal_Insect_M_PictureBook
text: This rare lizard lives deep in the forests. It feeds on high-nutrient foods, giving it great vitality. When used to make elixirs, they temporarily increase your maximum hearts.

label: Animal_Insect_Q_Desc
text: A butterfly found in the woods and plains of warm regions. Its wings absorb the warmth of the sun. Cook it with monster parts to create an elixir that makes you feel warm and fuzzy.

label: Animal_Insect_R_Name
text: Thunderwing Butterfly

label: Animal_Insect_B_Desc
text: This rare frog only ventures out in the rain. When cooked with monster parts, the elixir it produces will temporarily increase your maximum stamina.

label: Animal_Insect_I_Desc
text: This rare dragonfly only appears in the rain. Its wings direct electricity away from its body. Cook it with monster parts for an electricity- resistance elixir.

label: Animal_Insect_I_PictureBook
text: This rare dragonfly only appears in the rain. Its wings direct electricity away from its body. Cook it with monster parts for an electricity- resistance elixir.

label: Animal_Insect_B_Name
text: Tireless Frog

label: Animal_Insect_M_Desc
text: This rare lizard lives deep in the forests. It feeds on high-nutrient foods, giving it great vitality. When used to make elixirs, they temporarily increase your maximum hearts.

label: Animal_Insect_T_Desc
text: This dragonfly has a special organ that causes it to sweat profusely. Cook it with monster parts for an elixir that will raise your core temperature so you can resist the cold.

label: Animal_Insect_F_Name
text: Fairy

label: Animal_Insect_E_Desc
text: These fireflies glow gently in the dark. When cooked with monster parts, the compound that causes it to glow results in an elixir that will allow you to move more quietly.

label: Animal_Insect_AB_PictureBook
text: This rare butterfly lives in volcanic regions. Its body contains a heat-resistant liquid, which can be turned into a topical elixir that offers resistance to flames.

label: Animal_Insect_G_PictureBook
text: This beetle's razor-sharp horns demand that you handle it with care. Boil the horns alongside monster parts to concoct an elixir that will raise your attack power.

label: Animal_Insect_AA_Name
text: Energetic Rhino Beetle

label: Animal_Insect_M_Name
text: Hearty Lizard

label: Animal_Insect_X_Desc
text: This rare lizard can only be found in the Eldin region. Its scales have heat-resistant properties, so when cooked with monster parts, it produces a heat-resistance elixir.

label: BeeHome_Desc
text: Honey straight from the hive is chock-full of nutrients. Cooking this into a meal unlocks the potential of these nutrients and provides a stamina-recovery effect.

label: Animal_Insect_H_PictureBook
text: A very energetic cricket. Cook it with monster parts to create a stamina-recovery elixir.

label: Animal_Insect_Q_Name
text: Summerwing Butterfly

label: Animal_Insect_P_Desc
text: This beetle's hard body resembles armor. When the shell is cooked with monster parts, the resulting elixir boosts your defense.

label: Animal_Insect_E_PictureBook
text: These fireflies glow gently in the dark. When cooked with monster parts, the compound that causes it to glow results in an elixir that will allow you to move more quietly.

label: Animal_Insect_X_Name
text: Fireproof Lizard

label: Animal_Insect_X_PictureBook
text: This rare lizard can only be found in the Eldin region. Its scales have heat-resistant properties, so when cooked with monster parts, it produces a heat-resistance elixir.

label: Animal_Insect_A_Desc
text: A quick frog that can be found hopping around near water. Cook it with monster parts to draw out its speed-boost effect.

label: Animal_Insect_I_Name
text: Electric Darner

label: Animal_Insect_H_Desc
text: A very energetic cricket. Cook it with monster parts to create a stamina-recovery elixir.

text: This fairy will fly from your pouch and heal all your wounds the moment you lose your last heart. It's easily mistaken for a firefly at first, but it glows in the daylight as well as night.

label: Animal_Insect_A_Name
text: Hot-Footed Frog

label: Animal_Insect_T_Name
text: Warm Darner

label: Animal_Insect_S_Desc
text: A lizard found throughout Hyrule. It's a bit slow to react at times, but if given a chance to escape, it will dart off quickly. Cook it with monster parts for a speed-boosting elixir.

label: Animal_Insect_E_Name
text: Sunset Firefly

label: Animal_Insect_T_PictureBook
text: This dragonfly has a special organ that causes it to sweat profusely. Cook it with monster parts for an elixir that will raise your core temperature so you can resist the cold.

label: BeeHome_Name
text: Courser Bee Honey

text: This rare frog only ventures out in the rain. When cooked with monster parts, the elixir it produces will temporarily increase your maximum stamina.

text: Rugged Rhino Beetle
